dataset.name: Tier A-1: Blackwell vs Hopper Inference Performance
dataset.description: Focused synthesis with fresh benchmarks and cross-verification

userInputs.goal: Summarize current public **inference** performance for NVIDIA Blackwell (B200/GB200/Blackwell Ultra) versus Hopper (H100/H200) and AMD MI325X across MLPerf v5.1 tasks; explain architectural drivers (HBM capacity/bandwidth, interconnect) and list vendor vs independent results. Include citations and note unresolved gaps.

expected_characteristics: Multiple sources from MLCommons official data
Cross-verification between vendor claims and independent benchmarks
Technical depth on HBM3e and NVLink interconnect
Explicit acknowledgment of gaps in public data

dataset.name: Tier A-2: EU AI Act GPAI Obligations
dataset.description: Policy research with clear timelines and compliance mapping

userInputs.goal: List applicable **GPAI** (general-purpose AI) obligations now in force under the EU AI Act; map them to a web-research agent (logging, provenance, copyright, systemic-risk thresholds). Provide a timeline for compliance for models pre-Aug 2 2025 vs new models.

expected_characteristics: Clear distinction between pre-Aug 2025 and post-Aug 2025 models
Specific mapping to research agent capabilities

dataset.name: Tier A-3: C2PA Content Credentials for Agents
dataset.description: Technical feasibility assessment with standards documentation

userInputs.goal: Evaluate whether **C2PA Content Credentials** can be integrated into agent-generated reports (text+images); compare with alternative provenance methods; outline a minimal pipeline and threat model (tampering, missing metadata).

dataset.name: Tier B-4: Export Controls China AI Compute

userInputs.goal: Explain how recent **U.S. BIS rules** and **China customs actions** affect availability of AI accelerators (including China-specific SKUs). Summarize risk for multinationals (procurement, transshipment, services). Provide a sanctions-safe procurement checklist.

expected_characteristics: Recent news on China customs enforcement

dataset.name: Tier B-5: HBM Supply and CoWoS Bottlenecks

userInputs.goal: Quantify 2025 **HBM market shares** and **TSMC CoWoS capacity**; assess how these constrain accelerator deliveries across vendors, and forecast near-term relief. Cite primary/secondary sources and flag uncertainties.

expected_characteristics: Specific numbers for HBM suppliers (SK Hynix, Samsung, Micron)

userInputs.goal: Compare **RAG evaluation** frameworks (RAGAS, TruLens, DeepEval, FreshQA/FreshEval, RAGBench, etc.). Define metrics you'd actually use (faithfulness/attribution/grounding) and design a small eval harness for agentic research.

dataset.name: Tier C-7: Nordic Grid Readiness for AI

userInputs.goal: Estimate future **data-center electricity demand** in Nordics/Sweden and assess **grid constraints** (connection lead-times, zonal bottlenecks). Include mitigation (BESS, waste-heat reuse), and case studies (e.g., Microsoft Finland).

dataset.name: Tier C-8: Agent Security and OWASP LLM Top-10

userInputs.goal: Audit a web-research agent for **LLM security risks** (prompt injection, insecure output handling, model DoS, supply chain). Map **OWASP LLM Top-10** to concrete countermeasures in ReAct vs Orchestrator (policy at orchestrator vs worker).

expected_characteristics: Concrete examples for each risk category

dataset.name: Tier C-9: Benchmarks to Deployment Reality

userInputs.goal: Reconcile **MLPerf**/vendor claims with deployment constraints (memory capacity, HBM availability, interconnect topology, software stack maturity). Build a 'what actually matters' checklist for capacity planning in 2025–26.

expected_characteristics: Gap analysis between benchmarks and production
